parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.description: Specify a subtype to use any special selection column

selectionOptions.description: Json array{id: int, label: string} with options that can be selected, eg [{"id": 1, "label": "first"},{"id": 2, "label": "second"}]

selectionDefault.description: Json int|int[] for default selected option(s), eg 5 or ["1", "8"]

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.description: Specify a subtype to use any special datetime column

datetimeDefault.description: For a subtype 'date' you can set 'today'. For a main type or subtype 'time' you can set to 'now'.

selectedViewIds.description: View IDs where this columns should be added

baseNodeType.description: Context type of the column creation

parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

usergroupDefault.description: Json array{id: string, type: int}, eg [{"id": "admin", "type": 0}, {"id": "user1", "type": 0}]

usergroupMultipleItems.description: Whether you can select multiple users or/and groups

showUserStatus.description: Whether to show the user's status
